00017 RegularizeTransform::RegularizeTransform(Controller* c, double penalty) : TransformController(c) {
00018     
00019     this->penalty = penalty;
00020     params.resize(controller->getNumParams());
00021     penaltyVector.resize(controller->getNumParams());
00022     
00023 }

00025 void RegularizeTransform::setStepSize(double stepSize) {
00026     // Remember the step size of our children so that
00027     // we can appropriately scale the regularization.
00028     this->stepSize = stepSize;
00029     controller->setStepSize(stepSize);
00030 }
00031 
00032 void RegularizeTransform::setPenalty(double penalty) {
00033     assert(penalty >= 0.0);
00034     this->penalty = penalty;
00035 }

00038 void RegularizeTransform::batchStep() {
00039 
00040     // Get the pre-step parameters
00041     if (penalty > 0.0) {
00042         penaltyVector.clear();
00043         controller->reduce(penaltyVector, Approximator::PARAMS);
00044     }
00045 
00046     // Do the normal step
00047     controller->batchStep();
00048  
00049     if (penalty > 0.0) penalise();
00050 
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 void RegularizeTransform::instantStep(Vector& rewards) {
00055 
00056     // Get the pre-step parameters
00057     if (penalty > 0.0) {
00058         penaltyVector.clear();
00059         controller->reduce(penaltyVector, Approximator::PARAMS);
00060     }
00061 
00062     // Do the normal step
00063     controller->instantStep(rewards);
00064  
00065     if (penalty > 0.0) penalise();
00066 
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 void RegularizeTransform::penalise() {
00071     
00072     // Now post-process the new parameters
00073     // Scale to alpha and penalty
00074     penaltyVector *= -stepSize*penalty;
00075 
00076     // Do the penalisation.
00077     params.clear();
00078     controller->reduce(params, Approximator::PARAMS);
00079     params += penaltyVector;
00080     controller->scatter(params, Approximator::PARAMS);
00081 
00082 }
00083 }
